  • Constructor Details

    • SOM_GeomLineObj

      public SOM_GeomLineObj(SOM_GeomMapManager _mapMgr, SOM_ExDataType _exType, String _oid, SOM_GeomSamplePointf[] _srcSmpls, SOM_GeomObjTypes _GeoType, int _numSmplPts, boolean _shouldBuildSamples, boolean _shouldBuildVisRep)
      Constructor for base line object shared functionality
      Parameters:
      _mapMgr - : owning map manager
      _exType - : whether this is training/testing/validation etc.
      _oid - : pre-defined string ID put in SOM_Example OID field
      _srcSmpls - : the points and owning objects that make up the minimally defining set of points for this object. If src objects are null, then this object is a foundation/source object
      _GeoType - : the type of geometry this line represents (either 2d or 3d)
      _numSmplPts - : # of sample points to build for this object TODO move to post-construction process
      _shouldBuildSamples - : whether we should build samples for this object
      _shouldBuildVisRep - : whether we should pre-build a mesh representation of this object

    • SOM_GeomLineObj

      public SOM_GeomLineObj(SOM_GeomMapManager _mapMgr, SOM_ExDataType _exType, String _oid, String _csvDat, SOM_GeomObjTypes _GeoType)
      Constructor to build a line based on csv data
      Parameters:
      _mapMgr - : owning map manager
      _exType - : whether this is training/testing/validation etc.
      _oid - : pre-defined string ID put in SOM_Example OID field
      _csvDat - : String from CSV describing object
      _GeoType - : the type of geometry this line represents (either 2d or 3d)

    • SOM_GeomLineObj

      public SOM_GeomLineObj(SOM_GeomMapManager _mapMgr, SOM_GeomMapNode _mapNode, SOM_GeomObjTypes _GeoType)
      ctor to build line corresponding to a map node
      Parameters:
      _mapMgr - : owning map manager
      _mapNode - : the map node being represented
      _GeoType - : the type of geometry this line represents (either 2d or 3d)
